description:
If I do a GET on / with "Accept: application/xml", I see the following response. It is respecting my Accept header, but it is not setting the correct Content-Type on the response object.

< HTTP/1.1 200 OK
< Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8
< Content-Length: 336
< Date: Tue, 29 Mar 2011 15:25:56 GMT
< 
<versions>
    <version id="v1.1" status="CURRENT">
        <links>
            <link href="http://172.19.0.3:8774/v1.1" rel="self"/>
        </links>
    </version>
    <version id="v1.0" status="DEPRECATED">
        <links>
            <link href="http://172.19.0.3:8774/v1.0" rel="self"/>
        </links>
    </version>
</versions>
title: OSAPI versions response returns incorrect Content-Type
